attributes.action: Separate the position of Prime Minister from that of Party Leader
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The position of Prime Minister should be different to that of the Party Leader.  We have the right to choose the head of the government.  The Prime Minister should be elected by the people of the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
